revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Professor Elm.png|30px]]Professor Elm || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:Mr. Pokémon.png|30px]]Mr. Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cherrygrove City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Pokémon Day Care|Hatchery]] Queue feature. |- | Earl Dervish || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || Teaches the player about [[Baby Pokémon]]. |- | Primo || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || Teaches the player how to us [[Held Items]]. |- | [[File:Elder Li.png|30px]]Elder Li || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Ilex Forest|location]] and [[Questlines#Unfinished Business|requirement]] needed to unlock {{Pokemon|Celebi}}. |- | [[File:Hiker.png|30px]]Hiker Daniel || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Union Cave|location]] and requirement needed for {{Pokemon|Lapras}} to appear. |- | [[File:Bill.png|30px]]Bill || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player the requirements of {{Pokemon|Espeon}} and {{Pokemon|Umbreon}}. |- | [[File:Poké Maniac.png|30px]]Pokéfan Derek || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player that they now have access to the three legendary Beasts. |- | [[File:Sailor.png|30px]]SS Aqua Captain || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Olivine City]] || Tells the player about the [[Dock]]. |- | Photography Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cianwood City]] || Tells the player about [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]]. |- | Souvenir Shop Attendant || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Mahogany Town]] || Tells the player about [[Item Magnet]] effects. |- | [[File:Poké Maniac.png|30px]]Pokéfan Trevor || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Blackthorn City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | [[File:Hiker.png|30px]]Hiker || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Indigo Plateau Johto]] || Informs the player that [[Kanto]] is located in the east of [[Johto]]. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
